alert.note: Alert for Escambia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 22 at 9:12PM EDT until further notice by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Alabama...Florida... Escambia River Near Century affecting Escambia County. For the Escambia River...including Century...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Escambia River Near Century. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Considerable flooding of lowlands. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:05 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 17.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 17.7 feet early Friday morning. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 17.7 feet on 03/29/1946. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
